comments.body:
internally, it uses

``` scala
private val upCastingOrder: Seq[DataType] =
    Seq(NullType, IntegerType, LongType, FloatType, DoubleType, StringType)
```

to do type upcasting, no decimal type is involved

+   *   DoubleType -> StringType
